TopicTitle: [HELP] Gimbaled Motors...How to use...and not explode

Articles.Content: I keep jumping around on the launch pad and then tipping over and exploding anyone else have this problem? Solutions?

Yeah don\'t bother.

ASAS overcorrects itself causing ships to dance like a hula girl. So fly it manually, make your ship super big (wide), or add lots and lots and lots of struts vertically

I keep jumping around on the launch pad and then tipping over and exploding anyone else have this problem? Solutions?

That\'s got nothing to do with gimballing-your ships are too heavy. Add boosters around the bottom of your rocket (increasing ground surface) or use struts to secure the engine to your rocket.
